name: Atom Blaster
description:
Controls

-Drag an atom with your mouse!

-WASD to move and rotate your atom once it is built.

-Space Button will fire an electron if you have any black atoms!

Build an Atom

Too many atom's will make your atom unable to move because it is too heavy

Blue Balls make up the structure of an atom. Red Particles make your atom heavier
Green Particles make your atom lighter
Black Particles allows your atom able to attack!
Notes
It has been noted there has been a glitch where enemies will not die after bullet fire, this is being fixed!
Credits

A very rushed game made in 2 days by Kylan Haffie, blaze, Drunk Shark,  and Jordan Dube. Made for the Mini Jam 14 -Elements-
